org.apache.juneau.xml

Class XmlSerializerContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.Context
      • org.apache.juneau.serializer.SerializerContext
        • org.apache.juneau.xml.XmlSerializerContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HtmlSerializerContext

    public class XmlSerializerContext
extends SerializerContext
    Configurable properties on the XmlSerializer class.

    Context properties are set by calling ContextFactory.setProperty(String, Object) on the context factory returned CoreApi.getContextFactory().

    The following convenience methods are also provided for setting context properties:

    • XmlSerializer.setProperty(String,Object)
    • XmlSerializer.setProperties(ObjectMap)
    • XmlSerializer.addNotBeanClasses(Class[])
    • XmlSerializer.addBeanFilters(Class[])
    • XmlSerializer.addPojoSwaps(Class[])
    • XmlSerializer.addImplClass(Class,Class)

    See ContextFactory for more information about context properties.

    Author:
    James Bognar (james.bognar@salesforce.com)

    • Field Detail

      • XML_addJsonTypeAttrs

        public static final String XML_addJsonTypeAttrs
        Add JSON type attributes to output (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, type attributes will be added to elements in the XML for number/boolean/null nodes.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_addJsonStringTypeAttrs

        public static final String XML_addJsonStringTypeAttrs
        Add JSON type attributes for strings to output (Boolean, default=false).

        If true, type attributes will be added to elements in the XML for string nodes.

        By default, these attributes are not added, and the parser will assume that the content type of the node is string by default.

        This feature is disabled if XML_addJsonTypeAttrs is disabled.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_enableNamespaces

        public static final String XML_enableNamespaces
        Enable support for XML namespaces (Boolean, default=true).

        If not enabled, XML output will not contain any namespaces regardless of any other settings.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_autoDetectNamespaces

        public static final String XML_autoDetectNamespaces
        Auto-detect namespace usage (Boolean, default=true).

        Detect namespace usage before serialization.

        Used in conjunction with XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot to reduce the list of namespace URLs appended to the root element to only those that will be used in the resulting document.

        If enabled, then the data structure will first be crawled looking for namespaces that will be encountered before the root element is serialized.

        This setting is ignored if XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.

        IMPORTANT NOTE: Auto-detection of namespaces can be costly performance-wise. In high-performance environments, it's recommended that namespace detection be disabled, and that namespaces be manually defined through the XML_namespaces property.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot

        public static final String XML_addNamespaceUrisToRoot
        Add namespace URLs to the root element (Boolean, default=true).

        Use this setting to add xmlns:x attributes to the root element for the default and all mapped namespaces.

        This setting is ignored if XML_enableNamespaces is not enabled.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_defaultNamespaceUri

        public static final String XML_defaultNamespaceUri
        Default namespace URI (String, default=null).

        Specifies the default namespace URI for this document.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_xsNamespace

        public static final String XML_xsNamespace
        XMLSchema namespace (Namespace, default={name:'xs',uri:'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema'}).

        Specifies the namespace for the XMLSchema namespace, used by the schema generated by the XmlSchemaSerializer class.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_xsiNamespace

        public static final String XML_xsiNamespace
        XMLSchema-Instance namespace (Namespace, default={name:'xsi',uri:'http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance'}).

        Specifies the namespace of the XMLSchema-instance namespace used fornil=true attributes.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • XML_namespaces

        public static final String XML_namespaces
        Default namespaces (Set<Namespace>, default=empty set).

        The default list of namespaces associated with this serializer.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
